channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Is the 1% Rule Dead? + Why Building (NOT Buying) Could Make You More
item.description: Could building houses make you more money than buying existing ones? When should someone use the 1% rule in real estate, and when does this metric point to a cash […]

item.title: Sona, a frontline workforce management platform, raises $27.5M with eyes on US expansion
item.description: Sona, a workforce management platform for frontline employees, has raised $27.5 million in a Series A round of funding. More than two-thirds of the U.S. workforce are reportedly in frontline jobs, which might be anything from customer service and healthcare to retail environments and hospitality. But managing this vast workforce, ensuring roles are filled and […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: When Bad Cops Become Private Security Guards
item.description: There’s growing evidence that former officers with troubling histories of abuse can easily find second careers in private security.

item.title: The 7-Hour Itch: 3 Women With Eczema Describe the Ways They Combat Nighttime Flare-Ups
item.description: Three women with eczema describe how they combat nighttime flare-ups.

item.title: The Small Business Owner’s Guide to Taxes, LLCs, Deductions, & Audit Risks
item.description: Starting your first or next business? This episode is for you. Today, we’re bringing you everything you need to know about small business taxes for beginners. Whether you’re a solo […]

item.title: Uber to acquire Foodpanda’s Taiwan unit from Delivery Hero for $950M in cash
item.description: Uber Technologies announced Tuesday that it will buy the Taiwan unit of Delivery Hero’s Foodpanda for $950 million in cash. The deal is part of Uber Eats’ strategy to expand in Asia, specifically by strengthening its position in Taiwan. On the other hand, it also underscores Delivery Hero’s ongoing retreat from that same market: the sale […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: A Rare Bright Spot for a Canine Lover Doing Time: Raising Puppies to Become Service Dogs
item.description: Adam Roberts reflects on the highs and occasional lows of training Labrador retrievers for the Puppies Behind Bars program.

item.title: A Mother’s Love: The Challenges of Parenting a Child With Eczema
item.description: Two moms reveal the great lengths they went to in their determination to give their children relief and good health.

item.title: What Exactly Does a Property Management Company Do?
item.description: A property management company plays a vital role in overseeing the daily operations of rental properties to ensure efficient tenant management while maximizing profitability.

item.title: Paris-based VC firm Blisce launches climate tech fund with a target of $160M
item.description: Paris-based Blisce has become the latest VC firm to launch a fund dedicated to climate tech. It plans to raise as much as €150M (about $162M). © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: The Marshall Project Wins the Dart Award for “The Mercy Workers”
item.description: Our feature on mitigation specialists who help save people from the death penalty was recognized for making “significant contributions to public understanding of trauma-related issues.”

item.title: Working It Out: How to Minimize Eczema Flare-ups at the Gym and on the Job
item.description: Three keys to managing your eczema at the gym and then heading off to a productive and itch-free workday.

item.title: 21 Smart Ways to Save on College Tuition Costs and Keep Money For Other Investments
item.description: Use these practical tips to make paying for college a bit easier for you and your family.

item.title: Maad raises $3.2M seed amid B2B e-commerce sector turbulence in Africa
item.description: Maad, a B2B e-commerce startup based in Senegal, has secured $3.2 million debt-equity funding to bolster its growth in the western Africa country and to explore fresh opportunities in the wider Francophone region. The seed round was led by Ventures Platform, with participation from Seedstars International Ventures, Reflect Ventures, Oui Capital, Launch Africa, Voltron Capital […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Weinstein Ruling Poses Quandary: Can #MeToo Coexist With Protections for Defendants?
item.description: Proving sex crimes often requires evidence that is generally excluded to protect the rights of the accused.

item.title: Cows Are Potential Spreaders of Bird Flu to Humans
item.description: Cow udders have the same receptors for flu viruses as humans and birds, raising concerns that cows could become “mixing vessels” that help the bird flu virus spread between people.

item.title: Homeowners Are Slashing Prices In This Popular Region—Is There a Golden Opportunity For Investors?
item.description: Inventory rose by a staggering 50% year over year in this popular state. Time to strike while the iron's hot?

item.title: OpenAI Startup Fund raises additional $5M
item.description: The fresh funds were raised from two investors who transferred the capital into a special purpose vehicle, a legal entity associated with the OpenAI Startup Fund. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Mississippi Lawmakers Considered Modest Public Defense Reforms. They Rejected All of Them.
item.description: With its refusal to impose oversight or consistent standards in local defense, Mississippi risks falling further behind rest of the U.S., critics say.

item.title: Age-Related Macular Degeneration: Putting a Hole in Our World
item.description: Estimates show that by 2040, age-related macular degeneration may affect nearly 300 million people worldwide. And we are very limited in our ability to treat or prevent it. Here's what to know.
